articles.title: China fires missiles over Taiwan for first time as Beijing retaliates against Pelosi visit

articles.author: Colin McCullough and Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: Four people in critical condition after lighting strike near White House
articles.description: Four people are in critical condition following an apparent lightning strike across the street from the White House.

articles.author: Hannah Sarisohn, CNN
articles.title: Mall of America will remain closed after lockdown lifted
articles.description: A lockdown has been lifted at the Mall of America after shots were fired in an isolated incident, according to a tweet from Bloomington Police.

articles.author: Oliver Darcy, CNN Business
articles.title: Jury finds Alex Jones caused $4 million in damages to two Sandy Hook parents

articles.title: Cheney says DOJ not prosecuting Trump could call into question the US as 'nation of laws'
articles.description: Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney said if the Justice Department does not prosecute former President Donald Trump for his role in the insurrection at the US Capitol, the decision could call into question whether the United States can "call ourselves a nation of laws."

articles.title: Watch: Dick Cheney calls Trump a 'coward' in new TV ad supporting daughter's campaign - CNN Video
articles.description: Former Vice President Dick Cheney calls Donald Trump a "coward" in a new TV ad supporting his daughter, Liz Cheney, in her reelection campaign.

articles.title: Exclusive: Trump lawyers in talks with Justice Department about January 6 criminal probe
articles.description: The talks revolve around whether Trump would be able to shield conversations he had while he was president from federal investigators.

articles.title: Justice Department sues former Trump adviser Peter Navarro for emails from his private account
articles.description: The Justice Department sued former White House trade adviser Peter Navarro on Wednesday, seeking to force Navarro to turn over emails from a private account that he used while working at the Trump White House.
